name: Super Space'Stronaut
description: This is a a game created by me and it covers various concepts like moving platforms, enemies, door mechanics, acid, score pickups and additional extras to survive. It was inspired from my previous platformer Hermes and even Mario Bros. Have fun. Level 2 is very hard and you many feel like rage-quitting, but i have played every level and it is not impossible to finish the level, just frustrating. There are only 2 levels in the game as of now, will surely update it with more.
